a.xlink:title: Interface for components that require per-frame updates.
Abstract base class for game systems.
Propagates activation state from parent to child entities.
System that handles entity behavior when colliding with level boundaries.
System that spawns projectiles for entities with active ShootComponents.
System that processes solid collision events and applies damage.
Responds to gamepad input and issues game state commands.
System that detects dead entities and issues despawn commands.
Input component for twin-stick gamepad control schemes.
System that processes delayed component activations each frame.
Automatically advances the match through its state phases.
Evaluates match rules and conditions.
System that processes death events and awards scores.
System that clears the hasUpdate flag on ScoreObserverComponents.
System that updates ScoreObserverComponents from their referenced ScorePools.
System that steers entities towards their chase targets.
System that updates AABB colliders based on entity transforms.
System that clears collision state components at the end of each frame.
System that processes collision states and executes configured behaviors.
Collision detection system using uniform spatial partitioning for Broadphase and AABB overlaps in the...
System that processes 2D movement for entities.
System that updates the spin rotation of entities.
System that processes heading and rotation physics.
Updates the session's active viewport list based on state policy.
Renders scenes through their configured viewports.
System that synchronizes TransformComponents with SceneNodes.
System that composes the final ComposeTransformComponent from state components.
System that applies scaling to entities based on their ScaleStateComponent.
System that clears the dirty state of TransformComponents and ScaleComponents at the end of a frame.
System for binding score values to UI text components.
Computes screen positions for UI elements based on layout configuration.
Controls menu visibility based on session UI focus state.
Handles gamepad input for menu navigation.
System for updating UI text element bounds.
System for updating UI text element bounds.
